about_the_game:
Welcome to the Card Matching Memory Game, a classic and engaging game that will put your memory skills to the test. Get ready to exercise your brain and challenge yourself as you flip cards and try to find matching pairs.

In this addictive game, your objective is simple: flip over two cards at a time to reveal the hidden symbols. The goal is to find and match pairs of cards with identical symbols. But beware, as the cards will be shuffled and placed face down, requiring you to remember the positions of the cards you've flipped.

As you progress through the levels, the number of cards will increase, making the game more challenging. You'll need to rely on your memory and concentration to remember the symbols and their locations. Pay close attention to the cards you flip and use your cognitive abilities to recall their positions and make successful matches.

The Card Matching Memory Game is suitable for players of all ages, providing a fun and educational experience. It enhances cognitive skills such as memory, focus, and concentration, making it a great exercise for your brain.

Immerse yourself in the delightful visuals and soothing background music as you engage in this exciting memory challenge. Enjoy the satisfying feeling of successfully matching pairs and see how your memory skills improve over time.

With intuitive controls and a user-friendly interface, the Card Matching Memory Game offers a seamless gameplay experience. It's the perfect game to enjoy during your leisure time, whether you're looking to relax, sharpen your memory skills, or simply have fun.

So, get ready to exercise your memory, challenge your brain, and embark on an enjoyable journey of card matching. Test your memory prowess, uncover the hidden symbols, and strive to achieve the highest score in the Card Matching Memory Game.

★ Gameplay contains 5 level modes Easy – Medium – Hard – Pro – Extreme
★ TIME MODE: match the same pairs of images in a given time.
★ 9 categories (Pet Goods, Art Tools, Loot, Magic Loots, Autumn, Winter, Christmas, Food and Dishes, Sweets, and Desserts with easy, medium, hard, pro, and extreme level modes.
★ SCORECARD: scorecard summary corresponding to all levels modes to check your memory or win accuracy.

name: Cards Matching Memory Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
